title: Why Learning to Code is a great Thing
description: As technology continues to advance and become a vital part of our daily lives, knowing how to code has become an increasingly valuable skill. Learning to code can open up a world of possibilities, both personally and professionally.

title: Code can be fulfilling
description: A web app that will give users 10 new technical questions each day and track their progress in things like programming, cybersecurity, database architecture, and more!

title: Enhance Your Job Prospects
description: In a professional sense, knowing how to code can greatly enhance your job prospects and career opportunities. Many companies are looking for employees who are skilled in coding, and being able to code can make you a valuable asset in a wide range of industries.
